Title: They All Asked for You
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michelle Paradise, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Declan De Barra (story editor), Ashley Lyle (story editor), Michael Russo, Bart Nickerson (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: When a dangerous run-in with a coven of vengeful witches forces Rebekah to align with Marcel, they quickly discover that the body Rebekah is currently inhabiting has a checkered past. Upon ...
